item.title: Report E-2025020333
item.description:
Report E-2025020333

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-04
  • City: VINELAND
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 08:08 ET, XPO notified the Call Center of a cargo release at terminal XVL. It was reported that approximately 2 ounces of Total Solutions Vanquish released from one box containing four 1-gallon poly jugs due to improper loading by previous terminal. The release impacted only the carboard box container of the four 1-gallon jugs, the spill occurred on trailer #3212702 and was discovered on Dock #08 after being unloaded. Service Center Manager Michael Martucci gave permission for terminal personnel to clean up the spill. Waste label 226598-1 was created, one 5-gallon poly drum containing the carboard box containing four 1-gallon poly jugs. INFOTRAC was notified report #382116 was provided by Bobby.
